# Data Import

```{r Import01}

# Change names of SSM Headers 
dtCR_HDR <- fread(file.path("11_prep_data", "CR_HDR.csv"))
dtCD_HDR <- fread(file.path("11_prep_data", "CD_HDR.csv"))

# determine version of filename
version <- 
  paste0(format(today(), "%Y%m%d"), "_", 
         "W", isoweek(today()))          %T>%
  print(.)

# Status Order
status <- c("New", "In Review", "Awaiting CAB/GDA", "Create FD", "Being Implemented")
dtStatusOrder <- 
  data.table(
    CR_STATUS = status,
    CR_ST_ORD = paste0(1:5, ": ", status))

# Developers
cDEV <- c(CD_DEVELOPER = 
  "Floris Padt",             # COE
  "Chris Houlder",           # SAP Indigo
  "Pradeep",                 # AMS
  "Darshan",                 # AMS
  "Mohit",                   # AMS
  "Arjun",                   # AMS  
  "Rene van de Lei",         # EXPERTUM
  "Dirk Kemper",             # EXPERTUM
#  "Sander Van Willigen",    # EXPERTUM
#  "Sjoerd Van Middelkoop",  # EXPERTUM
  "Kasper Groen")            # GAAN

# Daily Tasks
cTASK <- c(
  "0: Management",
  "0: Monitoring",
  "0: Service Requests",
  "0: Incidents",
  "0: House Keeping",
  "0: Out Of Office")

# Expand Daily Tasks per Developer  
dtEXP <- 
  expand.grid(
    cDEV, cTASK)  %>%
  as.data.table() %T>%
  setnames(c("CD_DEVELOPER", "CR_URGENCY"))
```

# Tidy

```{r Tidy}

# Combine data set and Convert character to DateTime
# note the CDs contain CDs belonging to Incidents
dtALL <- 
  dtCD[dtCR, on = .(CD_REQ_ID == CR_REQ_ID), 
       nomatch = NA]                                        %>%
  .[dtStatusOrder, on = .(CR_STATUS)]                       %>%
  .[, CR_STATUS := NULL]                                   %T>%
  setnames("CR_ST_ORD", "CR_STATUS")                        %>%
  .[, `:=`(
    CR_CR_ON     = dmy(.[, substr(CR_CR_ON    , 1, 10)]),
    CR_REQ_START = dmy(.[, substr(CR_REQ_START, 1, 10)]),
    CR_REQ_END   = dmy(.[, substr(CR_REQ_END  , 1, 10)]),
    CR_LCH_ON    = dmy(.[, substr(CR_LCH_ON   , 1, 10)]),
    CR_DUE_BY    = dmy(.[, substr(CR_DUE_BY   , 1, 10)]),
    CD_CR_ON     = dmy(.[, substr(CD_CR_ON    , 1, 10)]),
    CD_REQ_START = dmy(.[, substr(CD_REQ_START, 1, 10)]),
    CD_REQ_END   = dmy(.[, substr(CD_REQ_END  , 1, 10)]),
    CD_DUE_BY    = dmy(.[, substr(CD_DUE_BY   , 1, 10)]),
    CD_LCH_ON    = dmy(.[, substr(CD_LCH_ON   , 1, 10)]))] %T>%
  setnames("CD_REQ_ID", "CR_REQ_ID")

# filter on BI
dtBI <- 
  copy(dtALL) %>%
  .[substr(CR_CATEGORY,1,5) == "SAP B"] %>%
  .[, CR_URGENCY := ifelse(
    CR_URGENCY == "", 
    "5: BackLog", CR_URGENCY)]

```

# Transform

```{r Transform01}
cols <- 
  c(dtCR_HDR[NEW != '', NEW], 
    dtCD_HDR[NEW != '', NEW]) %>%
  setdiff("CD_REQ_ID")

setcolorder(x = dtBI, neworder = cols)

```


```{r Transform02, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}

dtSUB <- 
  copy(dtBI) %>%
  .[, .(
    CR_TRAN_TYPE , CR_URGENCY  , CR_SOL_PARTY,
    CR_REQ_ID    , CR_DESCR    , CR_STATUS, CR_CR_ON,     
    CD_ID        , CD_DESCR    , CD_STATUS, CD_CR_ON, 
    CR_SUP_TEAM  , CD_DEVELOPER, CD_TESTER, CR_CUR_PROCESSOR, 
    CD_COE_EXP)] %T>%
  setorder(-CR_TRAN_TYPE, CR_STATUS, CR_URGENCY, CR_REQ_ID, CD_ID )

dtADD <- 
  copy(dtSUB)[0] %>%
  .[dtEXP, on = .(CR_URGENCY, CD_DEVELOPER)]

dtPLAN <- 
  list(dtSUB, dtADD) %>%
  rbindlist()

setkey(dtPLAN, CR_URGENCY, CR_STATUS)
```
